heading: baby boom
subheading: reuters reports from moscow that "a tipsy russian priest accidentally set off a hand grenade after a weekend christening..." the explosion may have been unintentional, but it does leave some questions unresolved. like what was a priest doing liquored up and waving around a hand grenade? the baby was unharmed in the "accident" but the priest and the baby's grandmother suffered some injuries.
author: wired staff
